list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sit on and control the movement of (an animal, especially a horse), typically as a recreation or sport.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I haven't ridden much since the accident
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã không cưỡi nhiều kể từ vụ tai nạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be carried or supported by (something with a great deal of momentum).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a stream of young surfers fighting the elements to ride the waves
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một dòng những người lướt sóng trẻ chiến đấu với các yếu tố để cưỡi sóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be full of or dominated by.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you must not think him ridden with angst
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn không được nghĩ rằng anh ta cưỡi với angst

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: yield to (a blow) so as to reduce its impact.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Harrison drew back his jaw as if riding the blow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Harrison đã rút lại hàm của mình như thể cưỡi đòn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a journey made on horseback, on a bicycle or motorcycle, or in a vehicle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: investors have had a bumpy ride
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các nhà đầu tư đã có một chuyến đi gập ghềnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a roller coaster, merry-go-round, or other amusement ridden at a fair or amusement park.
a cymbal used for keeping up a continuous rhythm.
